create_account.subtitle: To create an account, please fill in the information below
create_account.disclaimer: We use the information you provide to better tailor the communications, offers and materials we deliver. By creating an account or signing in, you are agreeing to our
create_account.success: Thanks for registering, please check your email for a verification message.

validations.names: Name must be at least 2 characters long
validations.password: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validations.duplicate_email: The email address you used is already registered with a TorStar account
validations.must_match: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
validations.invalid_input: Current password is invalid. Please try again.

change_password.criteria: Your password must be a minimum of 8 characters long.
change_password.confirm_password_criteria: Passwords do not match. Please try again.

forgot_password.title: Please enter an email address associated with your account. We'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.error: Sorry, that email address does not have an account. Please try again.
forgot_password.success: Thank you. We will send an email with instructions to reset your password. If you do not receive an email, please check your junk folder and resend another by clicking below.
